'Play: The Videos' is a compilation DVD of music videos by Peter Gabriel,
released in 2004. The DVD contains remastered audio tracks of songs in DTS 5.1
(DTS 96Â kHz/24-bit) and Dolby Digital 5.1 Surround Sound. The new surround
sound mixes were created by Daniel Lanois and Richard Chappell.
